# LocalAuthenticationView

**Structure**

A SwiftUI view that displays an authentication interface.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct LocalAuthenticationView<Label> where Label : View
```

## Overview

Use a [doc://com.apple.localauthentication/documentation/LocalAuthentication/LocalAuthenticationView] to display a view that prompts users to authenticate with the app. The view visually represents the state of an [doc://com.apple.localauthentication/documentation/LocalAuthentication/LAPolicy] evaluation from the [doc://com.apple.localauthentication/documentation/LocalAuthentication] framework.

The following shows a [doc://com.apple.localauthentication/documentation/LocalAuthentication/LocalAuthenticationView] in a Mac app with an implicit [doc://com.apple.localauthentication/documentation/LocalAuthentication/LAContext] instance:

```swift
var body: some View {
    LocalAuthenticationView(
        "Continue with Touch ID",
        reason: Text("Access sandcastle competition designs")
    ) { result in
        switch result {
        case .success:
            print("Authorized")
        case .failure(let error):
            print("Authorization failed: \(error)")
        }
    }
    .controlSize(.large)
}
```

If your app’s authorization flow reuses an existing [doc://com.apple.localauthentication/documentation/LocalAuthentication/LAContext], pass it as part of initializing a [doc://com.apple.localauthentication/documentation/LocalAuthentication/LocalAuthenticationView] and call its [doc://com.apple.localauthentication/documentation/LocalAuthentication/LAContext/evaluatePolicy(_:localizedReason:reply:)] method after the view appears.

## Authenticating with an implicit context

- **init(reason:context:result:label:)**: Creates a local authentication view.
- **init(_:reason:context:result:)**: Creates a local authentication view with a title.
- **init(_:reason:context:result:)**: Creates a local authentication view with a localizable title.
- **init(_:reason:context:result:)**: Creates a local authentication view with a title text view.

## Authenticating with a context you supply

- **init(_:context:)**: Creates a local authentication view with a required context.
- **init(context:label:)**: Creates a local authentication view with a label and required context.
- **init(_:context:)**: Creates a local authentication view with a localizable title and required context.

## Initializers

- **init(_:context:)**: Creates a new view and pairs it with the specified authentication context.
- **init(_:reason:context:result:)**: Creates a new `LocalAuthenticationView`.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- View
